review: Have this device now going on 5 weeks.  So far, no issues.  I love it.  Faster than the Roku I have in my bedroom.  Have not had to "unplug" and plug in to "dump" memory/data.  Fast.  Love the voice feature for quicker searching.
author: Shawn

review: Easy to use, love being able to use apps w/the touch of a button.  Very small piece of equipment, but tons of uses.

review: Very easy to use.  Hook up was easy. Endless movies.  We are somewhat electronically challenged so this was a good fit. And also was a great price.
